import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./navbar.css"; function Navbar() { const [navState, setNavState] = useState({ active: false, icon: "nav__toggler", }); const navToggle = () => { setNavState((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, active: !prevState.active, icon: prevState.active ? "nav__toggler" : "nav__toggler toggle", })); }; return (
